name: Atlantean Puzzlebox
description:
A simple little game about trying to score as many points in a certain number of moves. Very much WIP, as the final set of features, mechanics, and assets are still coming.

All actions use the mouse. (Keyboard controls also WIP)

Any and all feedback is appreciated. Thanks and good luck!

Updates:

v0.1.1 - Fixed a gamebreaking bug on the last column
